entries.title: Biden signs $1.7T government spending bill, ensuring funding for most of 2023
entries.description: President Joe Biden Thursday signed the omnibus spending bill into law while on vacation, extending funding for the government into next year.

entries.title: 3 charged in Mall of America killing days before Christmas
entries.description: Three suspects have been charged Thursday in connection to the Mall of America shooting on Dec. 23 that killed 19-year-old Johntae Hudson, of St. Paul, inside the mall’s Nordstrom store

entries.title: Warren Buffett jumps into local politics to fight streetcar
entries.description: Billionaire investor Warren Buffett broke with his practice of staying out of local politics to urge his hometown of Omaha to abandon its planned streetcar project because he says it's too expensive and not as flexible as buses

entries.title: Fashion designer Vivienne Westwood dies at 81
entries.description: Fashion designer Vivienne Westwood has died. She was 81.

entries.title: Southwest says it will return to normal operations by Friday
entries.description: Southwest Airlines said it plans to return to "normal operations with minimal disruptions", after days of chaos that saw the company cancel thousands of its flights.

entries.title: Brazilian soccer legend Pelé dead at 82
entries.description: Brazilian soccer legend Pelé, a three-time World Cup champion who's largely considered to be one of the best players ever, has died

entries.title: Jackson residents still under precautionary boil water notice
entries.description: Residents of Jackson, Mississippi, are still under a boil water advisory issued last week after freezing temperatures caused breaks in the city's troubled water system.

entries.title: Alfalfa sprouts being recalled after salmonella outbreak
entries.description: A Nebraska company is recalling alfalfa sprouts sold in three states after 15 cases of salmonella were linked to the food

entries.title: WATCH:  Camera sent underground to uncover Earth's oldest ice
entries.description: A Ph.D. student in Antarctica sent his camera more than 300 feet below ground to collect ice that researchers estimate to be over 2 million years old.

entries.title: Arizona recount shows Democrat Kris Mayes beat Republican Abe Hamadeh
entries.description: Kris Mayes defeated Republican Abraham Hamadeh by 280 votes after a mandatory recount was triggered

entries.title: Buffalo now prepares for flooding as temperatures soar
entries.description: After a historic, deadly snowstorm, Buffalo, New York is now bracing for potential flooding as temperatures are expected to rise.

entries.title: Bob Penny, bit actor in numerous Hollywood films, dies at 87
entries.description: An Alabama actor who played small roles in movies including “Forrest Gump” and “Sweet Home Alabama” has died at age 87

entries.title: US Census Bureau redefines meaning of 'urban' America
entries.description: Almost 1,000 towns, hamlets and villages in the U.S. lost their status as urban areas as the U.S. Census Bureau released a new list of places considered urban based on revised criteria

entries.title: Women, kids among 1,200 Afghan illegals jailed in Pakistan
entries.description: Officials say Pakistani police in multiple raids detained at least 1,200 Afghan nationals, including women and children, who had entered the southern port city of Karachi without valid travel documents

entries.title: WATCH:  Ice breaks as family dances on top of frozen pool
entries.description: A cold calamity ensued after a family dared to dance on top of a frozen pool.

entries.title: 3 men in South Africa charged for racist attack at swim pool
entries.description: Three white men in South Africa have been charged with crimes including attempted murder after an alleged racist attack on two Black boys that has sparked public outrage

entries.title: Djokovic says no hard feelings over Australian deportation
entries.description: Novak Djokovic has reiterated his earlier comments that he bears no hard feelings on his return to Australia after his visa cancellation and subsequent deportation in January ahead of the Australian Open

entries.title: Lack of info on China's COVID-19 surge stirs global concerns
entries.description: There is global concern that new variants could emerge in the outbreak.

entries.title: Family files missing persons report for Theophilus London
entries.description: The family of rapper Theophilus London has filed a missing persons report with Los Angeles police this week and are asking for the public’s help to find him

entries.title: Could atmospheric river help undo drought conditions? Too early to tell, experts say
entries.description: The atmospheric river impacting the West Coast, while creating dangerous conditions for millions, could have a chance of temporarily reversing drought conditions.

entries.title: Massive fire at Cambodia hotel casino kills at least 16
entries.description: A massive fire raging more than 12 hours in a Cambodian hotel casino has killed at least 16 people with the toll likely to rise

entries.title: US to sell Taiwan anti-tank system amid rising China threat
entries.description: The U.S. State Department has approved the sale of an anti-tank mine-laying system to Taiwan amid the rising military threat from China

entries.title: Fire after highway crash in South Korea kills 5, injures 37
entries.description: A freight truck collided with a bus on a highway near Seoul.

entries.title: New year expected to bring more changes to state voting laws
entries.description: An explosion of new election-related legislation followed former President Donald Trump's lies about losing the 2020 presidential election due to fraud

entries.title: EPA investigating Colorado for discriminatory air pollution
entries.description: The Environmental Protection Agency is investigating whether Colorado’s regulation of air pollution from industrial facilities discriminates against Hispanic residents and other racial minorities, according to a letter released by the agency Wednesday

entries.title: California police make hate-crime arrest in anti-Asian rant
entries.description: Police say a Colorado man was arrested for investigation of committing hate crimes in California after two young adults of Asian descent were targeted with racist and homophobic comments as they recorded a TikTok video at an In-N-Out Burger

entries.title: 'Just in shock': Atlanta area residents react to boil water advisory
entries.description: Freezing temperatures in the Atlanta metro area caused pipes to burst and valves to freeze, resulting in little to no water pressure in many homes.

entries.title: WATCH:  No serious injuries after steel guardrail impales vehicle in Connecticut
entries.description: Fire officials said two people suffered minor injuries after colliding with a steel guardrail that impaled their vehicle near Manchester, Connecticut.

entries.title: AG charges former officer in Floyd protest beating
entries.description: Attorney General Keith Ellison has charged a former Minneapolis police officer with beating a man during protests over George Floyd's death

entries.title: 'Varsity Blues' mastermind Rick Singer pleads for leniency with sentence
entries.description: Singer pleaded guilty in 2018 and has since helped federal prosecutors in Boston with their sweeping investigation.
